## Vector3.scaleAndAddToRef() method

Scale the current Vector3 values by a factor and add the result to a given Vector3

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
scaleAndAddToRef(scale: number, result: Vector3): Vector3;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  scale | <code>number</code> | defines the scale factor |
|  result | <code>Vector3</code> | defines the Vector3 object where to store the result |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Vector3`

the unmodified current Vector3
